instruction: What metric was chosen to identify major crops in the Chiayi Golden Corridor and how far can this metric go?

instruction: What was the purpose of developing a multi-category crop hyperspectral image classification system in the Chiayi Golden Corridor?
Output: The purpose of developing a multi-category crop hyperspectral image classification system in the Chiayi Golden Corridor was to identify the major crops in the area. This system aimed to analyze and classify different crops using remote sensing data from CASI (Compact Airborne Spectrographic Imager). The study used a two-stage classification approach, combining support vector machine (SVM) and convolutional neural network (CNN) techniques, to improve the accuracy of crop identification and classification. The system also included a repair module to address any classification errors.
